set.name: CustomActionsXml
set.value: <menu><item title="Add Admin" image="18_addResources.png" value="/ASP.Net/Modules/CIMS/CreateUser.ascx" full="" attributes="rolename=CollegeAdmin" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" command="SERVERCONTROL" height="550" width="650"/> <item title="Add Student" image="18_addResources.png" value="/ASP.Net/Modules/CIMS/CreateUser.ascx" full="" attributes="rolename=Student" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" command="SERVERCONTROL" height="550" width="650"/> <item title="Add Lecturer" image="18_addResources.png" value="/ASP.Net/Modules/CIMS/CreateUser.ascx" full="" attributes="rolename=Lecturer" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" command="SERVERCONTROL" height="550" width="650"/> <item title="Change Password" image="change_password.png" value="/ASP.Net/WebAdmin/UserManagement/ChangePassword.ascx" full="" attributes="UserID=[id]" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" command="SERVERCONTROL" height="180" width="430"/> <item title="Notify" image="ico_16_manage_members.png" value="AX.SendNotification|ASP.Net/System/Notify/AX.SendNotification.js" full="" attributes="UserIDs=[ids]" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" command="CLIENTCONTROL" height="250" width="500"/><item title="Unlock" image="ico_18_quota.png" value="AX.UM_UnlockDialog|ASP.Net/WebAdmin/UserManagement/AX.UserManagement.js" full="" attributes="UserID=[id]" pos="out" showoutlabel="true" command="CLIENTCONTROL" height="180" width="420"/><item title="Delete" image="16_delete.png" value="AX.UM_DeleteUserDialog|ASP.Net/WebAdmin/UserManagement/AX.UserManagement.js" full="" attributes="UserID=[id]" pos="in" showoutlabel="" command="CLIENTCONTROL" height="150" width="400"/></menu>
